website_summaries.verdict: If you need something more feminine-looking, try these floral shelf brackets. Just be aware they will not hold as much as more industrial-looking alternatives.
pros: Vintage-style floral pattern design in triangle shape
cons: You may wish to use different drywall screws from the ones provided

customer_reviews.title: These were very bent - when you mount them to ...
customer_reviews.text: These were very bent - when you mount them to the wall you can see how they all lean to one side. Unfortunately for me, I didn't notice until after I'd painted and hung them. Be sure to check them before you put them up!
customer_reviews.author: Jon and Tammy Wanzer

customer_reviews.title: Not strong or sturdy whatsoever! But pretty!
customer_reviews.text: These shelf brackets are very pretty, But they are not very sturdy at all, as claimed in the listing.. they are not made of strong iron whatsoever! Very Misleading.. I can easily bend them with my hands with using no force whatsoever. I don’t recommend using these on shelves any bigger than 20” wide. With nothing more than 5 pounds on them, even if you grab the studs. I’m a bit disappointed. I wanted to use these to store extra dishes, but there is no way that that these brackets will handle a load like that..
customer_reviews.author: Barbara CT

customer_reviews.title: A great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: They were very easy to put up, very light weight and yet sturdy. Much cheaper than purchasing from Lowe's (where we got the actual shelves) and the cheapest we found with the wrought iron scrollwork we enjoy on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Nice, really nice
customer_reviews.text: I love the design and the sturdiness. I got a set for a window shelf in my kitchen and loved them so much that I got another set for my living room windows to make a shelf.
customer_reviews.author: Patty Ahland

customer_reviews.title: Not for heavy duty.
customer_reviews.text: These look great, but they are really very flimsy. The thin wire and minimal welds equal very little support or stability. The seller has provided me with excellent customer service, however, and I will purchase other products from them.
customer_reviews.author: Tibb Tabby

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these brackets! Purchased these to hang some cutom shelf’s in my office. Very sturdy and elegant. Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. ABC

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and durable
customer_reviews.text: These are beautiful in the right places. I ordered them for an old window project I’m doing and I think these will work out just right.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful brackets!
customer_reviews.text: I love these brackets! I got them to make shelves for my Willow Tree angel collection and they turned out better than planned. Great quality and even came with the hardware.
customer_reviews.author: kfrashier

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and just right for my decor.
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE LOVE them. I order 4 to have spares. These will fit perfectly with my current style in my bathroom..
customer_reviews.author: Kiki Nana

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: I have an entertainment center that is a bit outdated. I took down the old doors that hung over the openings in the front top cabinet. My TV was blocking them. I added these as an alertnative to the space to make it not look so empty. They fit well, and look a lot more attractive in person vs the pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Denise M. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Work well. They are very strong. Hold up ...
customer_reviews.text: Work well. They are very strong. Hold up four plus gallons of liquid at all times. Not only that, they are gorgeous!
customer_reviews.author: RStar

customer_reviews.title: Great shelves.  Terrible wall anchors provided.
customer_reviews.text: The shelf brackets are sturdy and well made. The dry wall anchors provided are terrible. Spend an extra 3 bucks and buy some good wall anchors to use with these brackets.
customer_reviews.author: Abrams A1

customer_reviews.title: They were fine even though I settled.
customer_reviews.text: I ask for 5 inch and I got 8 inch brackets. But it's fine. Too much hassle to send back and I wanted to finish my project so I made it work. Yes, I was a little miffed considering my last 2 orders there was something wrong. Not sure If I will be ordering anything else for a while.
customer_reviews.author: Sandee Hill

customer_reviews.title: Pretty
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty and as seen. I will use my own mounting supplies to put them up, the plastic anchors that come with it look cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Jade Perri

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but thin
customer_reviews.text: Do not expect it to hold a lot of weight
customer_reviews.author: Donna Evans

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Love these, though they are much smaller than I expected. But , they still look great and for the area I used them for.
customer_reviews.author: brandy truebenbach

customer_reviews.title: Very thin, not thick or chunky metal.
customer_reviews.text: Good for the money, if looking for something a little more refined.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne R.

customer_reviews.title: Intended for medium to light weight, pretty
customer_reviews.text: pretty. some of the hardware came ill-machined. screws with no slots for screwdrivers, brackets arrived bent. I appreciated hat the seller issued a partial refund for the inconvenience.
customer_reviews.author: BellatrixKnits

customer_reviews.title: Nice, would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Great price, these look great with 36x 12 on boards! Easy enough to install
customer_reviews.author: TeamKB62

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful brackets
customer_reviews.text: They are just beautiful as they make just the right accent to my decor.
customer_reviews.author: Arlene

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Cute. Perfect addition to my shelves and very supportive. A little cheap on the welding but overall they work.
customer_reviews.author: G.G

customer_reviews.title: Ok for lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Good if you’re hanging up separately. Tried to do 3 shelves and it looked extremely tacky. Bowed shelves as well so only good for something really light.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: Effective items of decor and function.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to green up the look of my bathroom. Look great with plants on.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: I really love these brackets
customer_reviews.text: I really love these brackets, I put them in the corners of my kitchen and they look great. I also used them under 2 shelves and they also look great there as well. Very good choice!!
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, but not heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: Great for hanging a shelf, but keep the weight fairly light and use all 4 brackets into studs.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Londeree

customer_reviews.title: Great and substanial
customer_reviews.text: Very nice I put my Bose speakers on them over my desk
customer_reviews.author: Edna Bowen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Look nice. Good price. You should use your own drywall screws.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Matching shelves!
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleased with these brackets. They were a close scroll match to a plate wall holder that I had.
customer_reviews.author: philbert

customer_reviews.title: They look great for the price
customer_reviews.text: They look great for the price, but are a bit rickety. I would recommend for decorative shelving with light to medium load.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Dumais

customer_reviews.title: There were great.
customer_reviews.text: Daughter wanted small shelves in her room to hold small lamps. There were great.
customer_reviews.author: Jason J. Piotrowski

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, a little thinner than I expected
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, a little thinner than I expected, not made for heavy shelf or to hold heavy products. But very pretty
customer_reviews.author: sofie grace

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: These brackets are beautiful. The offset pre-drilled holes makes it a snap to install. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Teresa M Weber

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These bracket look perfect in my bathroom to give it the contemporary country look
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Perfect answer to my problem
customer_reviews.text: The Brackets are exactly as advertised, and they worked very well.
customer_reviews.author: Waitus Howard Starling

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful brackets! Can't wait to use them. Will purchase from thus seller again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: BriBri2298

customer_reviews.title: Not exactly on the level.......
customer_reviews.text: Wire is welded into the right angle in a crooked manner. Had to slightly bend the brackets til they held the shelf horizontal.
customer_reviews.author: RJG

customer_reviews.title: These are perfect!
customer_reviews.text: The brackets look perfect! Just what I want. I can't wait to put up the shelves! They arrived on time and securely packed Many thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara S Davis

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my non-shelf project. Being used as a boot stand in my closet.
customer_reviews.author: Tutu Nana

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought some very similar at Lowe’s and these are just as good quality. These were also a lot better priced
customer_reviews.author: Josh & Sheila

customer_reviews.title: Just right
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure if I would like these but after they arrived I love them. I would post a picture but I haven't gotten to that part of my kitchen remodel yet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are really beautiful. I used them to add shelving for my ...
customer_reviews.text: These are really beautiful. I used them to add shelving for my windowsill herb garden.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... as stable as I thought but they are very pretty. Definitely more decorative
customer_reviews.text: They are very thin and not as stable as I thought but they are very pretty. Definitely more decorative. I wouldn't put anything heavy on them
customer_reviews.author: Jessica M. Fraker

customer_reviews.title: Pretty looking, but very flimsy
customer_reviews.text: Pretty looking, but very flimsy. Had a professional put the shelves up for me and even he said not to put too much weight on them. The shelf shakes with nothing on it.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Picozzi

customer_reviews.title: Nice brackets.
customer_reviews.text: These are very nice brackets. They are pretty and very easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Barrick

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Shelves are sturdy could be a little bit more sturdy I give them a four out of five rating
customer_reviews.author: lilies22

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: They are very well made and look better then ones I paid doubled.
customer_reviews.author: Georgia Davis

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for some rustic shelves I am having my husband build
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne

customer_reviews.title: Great buy and value for price
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. Works like a charm with shanty 2 chic shelves bought @ AtHome
customer_reviews.author: Arial

customer_reviews.title: EZPZ
customer_reviews.text: Easy installation and holds 12" shelving easily. Floral design is nice
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: Looks good but...
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice but not as strong as I hoped they would be. They hold the shelves but I am afraid to put anything too heavy on them, such as stacks of books.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Hendrickson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Look just like they do in the picture. Feel sturdy. So far satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: A.L. Gajeski

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy these they are cheapy and not even a perfect level
customer_reviews.text: Received these and went to mount them on the wall only to realize they are not a true 90° angle. My shelves wouldn't sit flush on the brackets without being tipped back making them not level and therefore unusable for placing items on. Do not buy these they are cheapy and not even a perfect level angle
customer_reviews.author: Corey Hoyt

customer_reviews.title: The decorative metal is the size of two linguini noodles put together, needless to say I'm disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I would not buy this again and I would not recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon shopper

customer_reviews.title: 5 Star Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Quick delivery and well packaged. The swirling wisps add to the attraction of these Brackets. I can't find fault especially since they're so inexpensive. I am very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: JC

product_meta.title: WINOMO 4pcs Shelf brackets Wall Mounted Floral Shelf Brackets Black
product_meta.description:
Description

This item is a pair of shelf brackets, which is made of durable iron material. It adopts floral pattern design in triangle shape, firm and sturdy to hold your bookrack, clapboard, set up box etc. Besides, it comes with screws for easy installation.

Features 

- Brand: WINOMO.
- Color: Black.
- Material: Iron.
- Size: 20 * 20cm/ 7.87 * 7.87 inch(L * W).
- Adopts floral pattern design in triangle shape.
- Firm and sturdy to hold your bookrack, clapboard, set up box etc.
- Comes with screws for easy installation.
- Vintage shelf brackets for convenient lifestyle.
Package Including
4 * WINOMO Wall Mounted Floral Style Shelf Brackets for Bookrack / Calpboard / Set Top Box (Black)
feature_bullets: Adopts floral pattern design in triangle shape.
Firm and sturdy to hold your bookrack, clapboard, set up box etc.
Comes with screws for easy installation.
Vintage shelf brackets for convenient lifestyle.
Simple and elegant multifunctional design that could compliment your living room, bed room, children’s room, or kitchen

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars175 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
